text:
Alisher Burkhanovich Usmanov (;; born 9 September 1953) is an Uzbek-born Russian oligarch. As reported by "Forbes" in 2020, Alisher Usmanov has a net worth of $11.68 billion.
Usmanov built his wealth through metal and mining operations, and investments, and is the majority shareholder of Metalloinvest.
He owns the Kommersant publishing house. He is also a co‑owner of Russia's second-largest mobile telephone operator, MegaFon, and co-owner of the Mail.Ru group.
